entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Port Carling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:49 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or freezing rain. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 10:51 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow with freezing rain in the morning and with rain late in the morning and in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. High plus 2. Forecast issued 10:51 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 10:51 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
